text:
e="preserve">Kainar Academy () is a private university in Almaty, Kazakhstan. The university was founded in 1991 as Kainar University (). In 2014, Kainar changed its name to Kainar Academy. It is accredited by the Ministry of Education and Science of the Republic of Kazakhstan.
In 1999, Kainar College was created by the university.
Academics.
The Academy offers Bachelors and Masters degrees. Kainar College offers studies in Jurisprudence, Accounting and Auditing, Primary education, and Computer Engineering. Masters degrees are offered in business, pedagogy, social sciences, journalism, and information studies.
